full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSHEGS GTOR 'DOD DON MYUR 'GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES 'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I LA GSHEGS GTOR 'BUL TSUL 'DOD DON MYUR GRUB CES BYA BA 'DI NI DAD LDAN DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, ,DGE SLONG SBYIN PA RGYA MTSO GNYIS KYI YANG YANG BSKUL BA BZHIN, ,YE DPAL MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG RANG GZHAN LA BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
